comments.author: acroman08

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Hasslong on July 09, 2023, 11:37:57 AM،how I can upload a photo here , I use a mobile First of all, if you post any image from your profile, it will not be displayed until you complete 30 activities with minimum 1 merit and become a jr member.  So you have to be minimum jr member or buy copper membership. And when your profile is enough to post an image then you can post the image as per below directionStep 1 - visit https://www.talkimg.com Step 2 - click  and  then copy Full BBcode and add your image link on your post where you want to post Image.-If you want to resize your image then use the following code bellow Code:[img width=200]image link[/img]Code:[img width=200 heigth=100]image link[/img]

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Hasslong on July 09, 2023, 11:37:57 AM،how I can upload a photo here , I use a mobile  You can add images on your post but the images won't be displayed because newbies are restricted but there are ways to remove the restriction.First, to remove the restriction, you need to earn merit which you already have and you must have 30 activity points so that your account will rank up to jr. member. Second, you can also remove the restriction by buying a copper membership and you will have a custom title called Copper Member. You can buy copper membership in this link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote. As of now, the only way for the images to display is that other forum member who's not a newbie will have to quote your post then the images will show.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Fuso.hp on July 14, 2023, 03:50:55 AMUploading photos on https://www.talkimg.com/ is easier than on Imgur. You can upload a specific size image on this website and paste it in the direct forum, in this case you don't need to click anywhere else. I wouldn't say that one is easier than the other. If you register an account on Imgur, you have access to all your updated images in one folder. You click on any of them, and the site allows you to change the size with one click. There are options such as small/big square and thumbnails of different sizes. After selecting a size, you just need to copy/paste the changed BBcode for it. But since Imgur no longer works on Bitcointalk, it doesn't matter any longer.
